is_del=1 and a.parent_id=c.id
Order by a.update_time desc
select id id, title title from cms_article where publish_type = '原创' Order by update_time desc limit 8

select a.id id, a.user userId, a.title title, a.update_time time,a.description content, (select nums from cms_counts c where c.pid=a.id and c.type =0) likes, (select nums from cms_counts c where c.pid=a.id and c.type =1) collection, (select nums from cms_counts c where c.pid=a.id and c.type =2) countComment from cms_article a order by update_time desc
select id id, title title from cms_article where is_del = 1 and publish_type <> '原创' order by create_time desc limit 12
select a.id id, a.title title from cms_article a, cms_community c where c.name = '本站需知' AND a.parent_id = c.id order by a.sort desc, a.update_time desc limit 3

select a.id id, a.user userId, a.title title, a.update_time time,a.description content,a.cover_image url, (select nums from cms_counts c where c.pid=a.id and c.type =0) likes, (select nums from cms_counts c where c.pid=a.id and c.type =1) collection, (select nums from cms_counts c where c.pid=a.id and c.type =2) countComment from cms_article a where a.publish_type = '资讯' order by a.update_time desc
select id id, title name from cms_article where publish_type = '评测' order by update_time desc
select id pid, title title, update_time createTime from cms_article where user = #{userId} order by update_time desc
